item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: lcAdmin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: lcAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://localhost/learning-centre.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: lcAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to Baizon

 

Founded in 2018, we beleive in establishing a strong foundation build on grasping maths and science principles.

At Baizonn, we equip your child to ace the semester.

We provide up-to-date curriculum and targeted lesson to set your child up success in the coming terms

 

Why Baizonn learning center?

The BAIZONN GROUP was incorporated by a joint partnership of highly accreditated S.T.E.M related Scientists, Educators, Engineers and Professors with an initiative that the study of STEM subjects at every grade level should be innovative and relevant in the modern day. Dedicated to provide organised access to quality resources and tools that support innovations in teaching and learning at all levels of science, technology, engineering, and mathematics education. 

Primary School

Primary School Mathematics | Primary School Science | PSLE Mathematics | PSLE Science

Secondary School

Sec 1-4 Mathematics | Sec 1-4 Science | GCE ‘O’ Level Mathematics | GCE ‘O’ Level Science

Junior College

GCE ‘A’ Levnceels Mathematics | GCE ‘A’ Levels Scie

How we teach

Your one-stop professional for teaching with exceptional learning needs

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PVoTRu3p6ug

Technical Expertise

Provide innovative STEM solutions for electronics, home automation, robotics, aquaponics and so on

STEM Expertise

Our STEM learning method model – FAST encompasses of all of everything your child needs to know in order to excel in the subject

F.A.S.T Value Proposition

Science, technology, engineering & maths education and profession

Find out more Our classes

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: lcAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Previous Next

Nurturing a Love For Learning

We have been cultivating a passion of learning in children for over 5 years in order to help them succeed in both school and in life.

From elementary school to junior college, our students take part in engaging, relevant classes that inspire them to think beyond the box.

View schedule! Registrate by clicking here!

Preparing Students To Achieve Success

Creating self-assured and successful learners
Everything we do is centered on our children, and we care about their success in school and overall well-being.

Along with educating them, we also assist our students develop the information, abilities, and attitudes that will enable them to solve challenges, think broadly, and pursue greatness.

Passionate Teachers That Make A Difference

Every student is encouraged by our teachers to do their best work and to develop the positive attitudes necessary to instill a love of learning.

We choose educators with the necessary enthusiasm and credentials and provide them the tools they need to give their students outstanding classroom experiences.

We're dedicated to helping every student reach their full potential.

Contact us! Our Awards

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: lcAdmin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: lcAdmin
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: https://baizonn-learning-centre-ba15e4.ingress-baronn.ewp.live.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

The BAIZONN GROUP was incorporated by a joint partnership of highly accreditated S.T.E.M related Scientists, Educators, Engineers and Professors with an initiative that the study of STEM subjects at every grade level should be innovative and relevant in the modern day. Dedicated to provide organised access to quality resources and tools that support innovations in teaching and learning at all levels of science, technology, engineering, and mathematics education. “To catalyze and invest back into the support of excellence in teaching and learning of STEM and other core subjects, can a society truly profit from innovative, research-based instructional strategies.”

The BAIZONN GROUP was incorporated by a joint partnership of highly accreditated S.T.E.M related Scientists, Educators, Engineers and Professors with an initiative that the study of STEM subjects at every grade level should be innovative and relevant in the modern day. Dedicated to provide organised access to quality resources and tools that support innovations in teaching and learning at all levels of science, technology, engineering, and mathematics education. “To catalyze and invest back into the support of excellence in teaching and learning of STEM and other core subjects, can a society truly profit from innovative, research-based instructional strategies.”

GROUP";s:12:"content_text";s:1100:"

[lgc_column grid="25" tablet_grid="40" mobile_grid="100" last="false"]

[/lgc_column]

[lgc_column grid="75" tablet_grid="60" mobile_grid="100" last="true"]

The BAIZONN GROUP was incorporated by a joint partnership of highly accreditated S.T.E.M related Scientists, Educators, Engineers and Professors with an initiative that the study of STEM subjects at every grade level should be innovative and relevant in the modern day. Dedicated to provide organised access to quality resources and tools that support innovations in teaching and learning at all levels of science, technology, engineering, and mathematics education.

“To catalyze and invest back into the support of excellence in teaching and learning of STEM and other core subjects, can a society truly profit from innovative, research-based instructional strategies.”

[/lgc_column]

item.content:encoded:
Welcome to BAIZONN
Founded in 2018, we believe in Establishing a Strong Foundation build on Grasping Maths and Science Principles.
At Baizonn, we Equip your child to ace the semester. We provide up-to-date curriculum and targeted lesson to set your child up for success in the coming terms.
F.A.S.T. = Firm Foundation, Apply, Surpass, Top S.T.E.M : Science, Technology, Engineering, Maths sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.

item.title: Michio Kaku
item.dc:creator: lcAdmin
item.content:encoded: In string theory, all particles are vibrations on a tiny rubber band; physics is harmonies on the string; chemistry is the melodies we play on vibrating strings; the universe is a symphony of strings, and the ‘Mind of God’ is cosmic music resonating in 11 dimensional hyperspace

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: An American theoretical physicist, futurist, and popularizer of science.

item.title: Stephen Hawking (1942 - present)
item.dc:creator: lcAdmin
item.content:encoded: One, remember to look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Two, never give up work. Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it. Three, if you are lucky enough to find love, remember it is there and don't throw it away.

BAIZONN PTE LTD (BPL) prepare teachers and students in Singapore to navigate challenging concepts in engineering and physical science subjects, by designing and developing products and tools to enrich students with discourses in the study of science and technology. We believe in building an approach to teacher/ student learning that focuses on science understanding, classroom practice, technology proficiency, and pedagogical reasoning via Spatial, Kinesthetic, Interpersonal and Mathematical (SKIM) learning methodology. We believe that technology used in innovative simulations can greatly enhance learning and assessment.
